name: Igneous Shield
description: Call the earth to your defense, granting a damage shield for nearby allies that absorbs 1365 damage. Your own damage shield absorbs 3414 damage. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You also gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by 16% for 2.5 seconds.
coefDescription: Call the earth to your defense, granting a damage shield for nearby allies that absorbs $1 damage. Your own damage shield absorbs $2 damage. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  You also gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by 16% for 2.5 seconds.

Call the earth to your defense, granting a damage shield for nearby allies that absorbs <<1>> damage. Your own damage shield absorbs <<2>> damage. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.

You also gain Major Mending, increasing your healing done by <<3>> for <<4>>.
